name: 15 Questions: The Patriot Multiple Choice Quiz | Movies

questions.text: How many children does Benjamin Martin have in the beginning of the movie?
What did Gabriel do to Anne when he was a child?
questions.correct: He got ink on her teeth
options: Put a dead rat on her bed
questions.explanation:
He got ink on her teeth.

	Anne gets him back.

questions.text: Which of Benjamin's sons dies at their farm after being shot by Colonel Tavington?
questions.explanation:
Thomas.

	He was trying to help Gabriel escape from the British.

questions.text: What was the surname of Benjamin's sister-in-law Charlotte?
questions.explanation:
Selton.

	She is Benjamin's deceased wife's sister.

questions.text: Which country promises to help the Americans?
What breed of dogs do Benjamin and his militia steal from a British carriage?
questions.explanation:
Great Danes.

	They were going to eat them!

questions.text: How many of Benjamin's men do General Cornwallis's troops capture?
questions.explanation:
18.

	Benjamin wants to trade them for Cornwallis's 'captured' men.

questions.text: When John Billings finds his wife and son dead, what does he do?

questions.explanation:
Colonel Tavington.

	Gabriel thought he was dead.

questions.text: What color eyes did Frenchman Jean Villineuve's children have?
When Tavington says that Benjamin was not the better man, who does Benjamin say was?
Does Benjamin die in the end?
questions.explanation:
No & n.

	He kills Tavington - revenge for Tavington killing his two eldest sons.

Roland Emmerich.

	He also directed 'Independence Day' and 'Godzilla'.
